t: Hangzhou Broadlink Technology Co., Ltd. - China Wifi Power Products, Wifi Universal Remote Exporter & Manufacturer | Global Sources
s: BroadLink grew up very fast as one of the leading third-party IoT platforms and built its comprehensive IoT eco-system in China through its accurate strategy positioning, leading technologies, open partnership plan, and "hardware + software + service" turn-key solution.

BroadLink brand (actually Hangzhou BroadLink CO., LTD) comes from China. It cooperates with such giants as Whirlpool, Honeywell, Electrolux or Mitsubishi. The company specializes in manufacturing devices and accessories intended for use in home automation systems.
